fold_selector.markdownDescription: The `fold_selector` should be the range that should be folded.

preceding_text.description:
If specified, the range will be folded only if the `preceding_text` is before the `fold_selector`.
InlineFold will scan max on line before to find the `preceding_text`.
If `preceding_text` is not found,
 the `fold_selector` region will not be folderd.
